name: Thunderstorm Black Oversized-Tee
description:
STORY

Thunderstorm Black Oversized-Tee.
Bold Looks. Double Impact.
This striking black oversized T-shirt delivers cutting-edge style for youth, featuring sharp front screen printing with HD Puff  and standout screen printing on the back. It's designed to turn heads, feel premium, and offer a unique tactile experience.

 DETAILS

✔️ 100% Pure Cotton- Super-soft, breathable, and gentle for day-long comfort[1].
✔️ Oversized Youth Fit- Stylish, relaxed cut for street-ready, confident wear.
✔️ Weight: 240 GSM- Heavy cotton jersey ensuring ultra durability and a luxurious hand-feel.
✔️ Front Screen Print- Features bold graphic screen printing Aijim Name HD puff. This creates a raised, 3D effect that pops visually and adds a tactile element, making the artwork feel as premium as it looks. for a crisp and durable design on the chest. Colors are fade-resistant and graphics remain sharp after repeated washes.
✔️  Screen Printing- The back showcases high-definition screen printing technology. 
✔️ Colour - Deep black base for maximum graphic impact.
✔️ Made in India - Tailored using high-quality stitching by skilled Indian craftspeople.



 ARTWORK FEATURES 

- The front print draws attention with clean lines and solid fills achieved by professional screen printing.
- The Screen  print on the back raises the artwork above the fabric, delivering depth and a unique feel.
- Both prints use eco-friendly inks and are engineered for long-lasting vibrancy and detail.



 WASH CARE

- Wash inside out with cold water to preserve both regular and puff screen prints.
- Use gentle detergents and avoid bleach to maintain print and fabric longevity.
- Do not iron directly over printed areas; use a cloth barrier to protect raised puff prints.


This black oversized  T-shirt marries modern printing technology with top-tier comfort and style, offering bold graphics, premium raised artwork, and lasting street-inspired appeal.

review.reviewBody: Amazing fabric and premium stitching. Highly recommended!

acceptedAnswer.text: Delivery usually takes 5–7 business days across India.
Yes, returns are accepted within 5 days of delivery.
